name: Robot Monkey Space Pirates
description:
In a universe plagued by Robotic Monkeys trying to disassemble your ship for scrap parts, lives a gentle robot and his small scrap engineers. And said gentle robot has gotten unlucky enough to encounter the rotten Robotic Pirates and now has to defend his ship and repair it to get away. You are the gentle robot, but now you must turn some robots in to scrap. Good luck.

Everything in this game is self made by the E. server crew, aside from the music.

(Music credit)
